00017 SumOfSquaredDifferences :: SumOfSquaredDifferences(Image& refR, TransformableImage& refT)

00031 void SumOfSquaredDifferences :: eval() {
00032   value = dist2(T.getTransformedImage().getData(),R.getData(),T.getNumberOfElements());
00033 };
00034 
00035 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 
00037 void SumOfSquaredDifferences :: evalGradient() {
00038     // copy
00039   sub(T.getTransformedImage().getData(), R.getData(), grad[0][0], T.getNumberOfElements());
00040   sub(T.getTransformedImage().getData(), R.getData(), grad[1][0], T.getNumberOfElements());
00041   dot(grad.getData(), T.getTransformedGradient().getData(), grad.getData(), grad.getNumberOfElements());
00042 };
00043

00047     return grad;
00048 };
